entry.title: [BIP Proposal] Utreexo Nodes
entry.summary: Calvin has successfully made a pull request (PR) as indicated in the review feedback, and it can be found at [GitHub](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/1923). This update was communicated through the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, to which the recipient is subscribed. This ensures that members of the group are kept informed about ongoing contributions and updates to Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIPs).
